alert.note: Alert for Mason; Oceana (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Beach Hazards Statement issued August 04 at 3:40AM EDT until August 04 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...BEACH HAZARDS STATEMENT IN EFFECT FROM NOON EDT TODAY THROUGH THIS EVENING... * WHAT...High wave action, strong currents, and dangerous swimming conditions expected. Piers may be heavily swamped by waves. * WHERE...Mason and Oceana counties. * WHEN...From noon EDT today through this evening. * IMPACTS...Strong currents can push swimmers into deeper water while high waves can exhaust swimmers trying to get back to shore. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds from the north will strengthen today and make the beaches near north piers more dangerous. High waves and strong currents will also be more focused near Big and Little Sable Points.
info.instruction: Remain out of the water to avoid hazardous swimming conditions and do not venture out on piers. Please check with your local authorities on potential beach closures.
